name: Star Citizen Model Viewer
description:
This game allows you to view the 3D models of ships from Star Citizen. The goal is to allow users to check out, but also view the ships in VR. Though VR is currently not implemented, it is definitely coming (hopefully very soon). 

As of now only the Origin 600i and Origin 400i are available for download. More ships will be added. If you want a specific ship to be added, feel free to contact me by leaving a comment, or sending me an email. Please note that bigger ships take longer to create.

Sometimes you might get stuck, this is because the collision shapes are generated from the complex geometry. For this I added a no-clip. If you hit Q it will disable collision and gravity, allowing you to get un-stuck.

Please note that there will be bugs. If you find one, don't hesitate to contact me at lowsignalstudios@gmail.com, so that I can fix it.
